If you happen to to be around the walking street in Saigon, this place is very recommended to satisfy your hungry stomach. I came to Poke Saigon 1 year ago for the first time, that was the first time I tried Poke and I was amazed! It was so delicious and the best thing is that you can arrange your own Poke bowl up to your preference. For me, I like the spicy tuna and spicy salmon here. I remember the staffs were very friendly and always smiling the last time I came. Now that I visited again after 1 year I still see friendly staffs here and the taste of Poke was as delicious as the last time I came here. Will definitely come again!
Hawaiian food in Vietnam - not traditional at all but really worth for tasting! Great food, so kindly staff and nice space. Thanks for superb experience
Best experience i had in saigon as the staff were very friendly and the ambience is great. Not to mention the great food as the ingredients were super fresh. Definitely recommend coming here!

Wonderful establishment with even more wonderful staff, in the midst of a crazy busy city you walk into a tropical oasis to find the warmest smiles greeting you :-) we had the cucumber, guava and honey smoothie along with our food and everything was beautiful, the ambience, food, smoothies and staff we top notch. It’s quite difficult to find through a small car park, up two flights of stairs but once you’re there you never want to leave. If using my photo for directions, walk through the blue car park located behind the left side tree... Thank you for making our experience so enjoyable x x

Stopped in here while travelling with a group in March 2020 and loved the choices and the services. Despite inundating them at lunchtime with a group of almost 20, the staff got right to work and with no complaints or hesitations got right down to building individual bowls for each of us. The food was fantastic with tasty, fresh sauces and really crisp vegetables. Definitely would visit again!
it tastes very good and I haven't found it in Indonesia yet, the diving is very friendly and the price is quite affordable
2 poke pour le déjeuner, service rapide, poke super bon, personnel gentil et souriant, restaurant joli et propre. Au top !Super rapport qualité/prix !

Raikasta ja maukasta ruokaa, kohtuu hinnat. Ihana lounaspaikka, hyvä ilmastointi ja siisti. Ystävällinen palvelu, hyvä englanti.; Ainoa huono oli paikan sijainti, vaikea löytää. Toisessa kerroksessa ja kulku läpi skootteritallin.
Es war mega mega lecker !! Man muss den Laden ein bisschen suchen aber man wird belohnt. Zudem ist die Bedienung sehr lieb. Wir kommen wieder!

Les meilleurs poke en ville. Traversez le garage de motos, montez l'escalier au 2e étage, allez au fond du corridor, vous y trouverez le resto. Pour 160,000 dong, on vous offrira un choix de produits frais pour créer votre bol. Un délicieux repas servi agréablement. Il faut y aller.
Not authentic poke they use the name only but it is just a mediocre Donbuti..; Your better off going to a Japanese restaurant and having a fresh donburi
This bowl is delicious and healthy. I really like it and will definitely come again, also recommend for my friends
Just found this lovely place in an old building of Saigon and the food here amazed me. Best Poke bowl ever!!!

While the concept is simple, the ladies working here make it for a food experience. They are attentive and service oriented. The salads are tasty and fresh. While not very inexpensive, the quality is good.
Just had lunch at Poke Saigon.; Nice place, super clean and fresh product.; We enjoy our poke and the service is super friendly.; Nice place

Quán rất sạch, đồ ăn rất ngon. nhân viên phục vụ tận tâm, luôn chào hỏi khách mỗi khi khách đến và đi. Mô hình kinh doanh phù hợp cho những ai quan tâm đến sức khoẻ và muốn tìm cho mình một nơi vừa ăn ngon nhưng cũng vừa đảm bảo được sự sạch của món ăn để kiểm soát được cân nặng.
Visited for the first time and everything went perfect!!! The food was fresh, flavorful and just pure deliciousness. Above all, the service was amazing. Special thanks to Ms. Ngoc.
Tried out new combination this time, and it was even better than the last time! Definitely recommend the marinated quail eggs, fun pop and go well with everything.
Superb! Totally fresh ingredients, their spicy salmon is a must-try!!! Also the quail eggs and all of that toppings. Seriously: healthy AND delicious!

So nice to have fresh, healthy food! Everything was very tasty and the staff is friendly and helpful. I had a base of salad and brown rice, and there’s a wide variety of toppings. I also learned that the fish used in poke is raw. Didn’t know that! Very refreshing to have fresh food. Highly recommend.
I love this place because of all the plant based options they have to make an amazing healthy and delicious dinner!
17.11.2020; Tasty!; Very delicious! Freshly, healthy!; Serves and staffs are five stars!; Thank you  very pleasant and friendly girl ( perfect English) helped me with order)

Mình biết đến quán do bạn bè mình giới thiệu cho mình. Lần đầu tiên mình ăn thì cảm thấy poke ở đây rất tươi, rất vừa miệng, lại rất healthy nữa. Món thích nhất của mình là cá hồi sốt cay và trứng ngâm tương
Mình dc bạn dẫn đến đây ăn lần đầu tiên, mặc dù mình là ng ko thích ăn rau lắm nhưng đồ ăn ở đây khá hấp dãn, nhân viên thân thiện,

I obviously live on another planet looking at the other reviews. I went today for lunch given all the hype but for me it was good but not amazing. Their located in The Cafe Apartments on the main Walking Street in Saigon (second floor). Small branch, limited seating. Think wooden seats, beach vibe Hawaii. I stupidly went at peak period lunchtime 13:00. Suggest going outside of main mealtimes. I luckily got a seat. You can eat in or take out. The line was long with two members of staff who were trying their best. More a place to eat and go rather than linger for ages. There were only two suggested 'ready-made' options. None appealed to me. I think if they have more ready-made choices, lines would be less. Most people like me made their own bowls which obviously took longer. Those that went for the suggested ready-made standard options were a lot quicker. Choose your base, I had salad which was lettuce leaves and then your toppings. There was a nice variety of toppings. What made me laugh was they had already run out of salmon! It was only 13:00. This is the most popular poke! They had other marinated salmon but I wanted the plain salmon so did others! I was surprised. I had tuna then. The regular option is two scoops which is enough. Just be mindful and make it clear if you have dietary restrictions. Staff were not very clear on this. Toppings ranged from mango to crab salad and quail eggs! Ingredients were fresh but some of the lettuce leaves were turning brown. Some toppings had an additional cost and if you choose quinoa as a base, this was also extra. They actually weigh the poke! My bowl was light and healthy as I chose the salad and avoided the heavy sauces and toppings. If you have the sushi rice, the portion size is generous and it will be quite filling. The bowls were well presented and pretty. Instagram lovers will have a ball! There are spoons or chopsticks to eat with plus soft drinks and water. Not sure about alcohol or tea. The fresh watermelon juice was to die for. So good! Better than the poke! No sugar and 100% juice. Really refreshing. It isn't cheap but poke never is. Staff try their best to keep the place clean. It was nice but this was definitely not the best poke I have eaten. I would recommend going but I wouldn't say this is like a top poke place having travelled much of the world. They don't accept AMEX. Would suggest looking online or at instagram before going and deciding on your toppings to make it easier. It's easy to get carried away otherwise!

Though I loved the Vietnamese food on my trip, by the end I was craving fresh, healthy light food. So I was happy to find Poke Saigon. It's inside an old apartment building on the 3rd floor. When I went it was during lunch hour so the wait was a bit long. And by the time I ordered some items were sold out like the spiced tuna. There's a lot to choose from - raw salmon and tuna, crab meat, veggies, choice of rice, salads, sauces. Too many choices! It's not the cheapest of meals (190,000) but will definitely keep you full for awhile unlike Vietnamese food where I'm constantly hungry! You can also get it packed to take away if you can't finish it. It looks like a small bowl but it's quite substantial!
